thread.section_title: Novotel Paris Saint Denis Stade Basilique - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Saint-Denis, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location
thread.title_full: Location - Review of Novotel Paris Saint Denis Stade Basilique, Saint-Denis, France - TripAdvisor

author: HarryMonster1
title: Location
text:
Ok Saw the reviews on this hotel and booked. The hotel is just opposite STADE De France and is beside the subway station and a metro.
What many reviews do not speak about is the surrounding neighbourhood. This is a high arab/african/indian neighbourhood and so we were warned to be careful re petty theft however nothing like that happened. The streets however are dirty which does not do the hotel Justice. The Hotel is on the outskirts of Paris so from the Airport is 50euros.
However with access so readily available public transportation to main areas is easy.
